price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߛߎ߬ߊߦߌߓߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
